When Sherman returned to the United States , he mostly put his terrible war experiences behind him and moved on .
Sherman got married to Marcia during Thanksgiving Break from college in 1946 , and the couple have raised two sons , Frank , 63 , and Rick , 60 , in their 67 years of marriage .
